Question: Anpoly CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ANPOLY

Re:ancel™ T-CNF

 -Eco-friendly material made from plant cellulose

 -Nano-fiberized for 5x strength and lighter weight compared to iron

 -Recognized as an Honoree in Sustainability, Eco-Design & Smart Energy at CES 2024
Summary_cn:
安波利

关于ancel™ T-CNF

-由植物纤维素制成的环保材料

-纳米纤维化技术使其比铁材料更强大和更轻

-在2024年国际消费电子展的可持续性、生态设计和智能能源类别中被认可为荣誉入选者
